cont.entity_a: Perfectly simple and functional piece of equipment with high standards of simplicity and sturdiness. Pushes juice out of orange halves super fast and efficiently. Used daily in a high volume cocktail bar for almost 6 years without issues. High powered and very easy to use, perfect for a commercial environment. Makes juicing oranges and grapefruit almost effortless. Squeezes between 30-100lbs of citrus daily in a cafe environment.
cont.entity_b: Efficient at extracting juice but hard to unlock. Extracts as much juice as possible. Powerful enough to handle a full size apple.

cont.entity_a: Solidly built and acts like a strong, well-built piece of machinery. The cone design causes the citrus fruit to come off during juicing and bites the hand.
cont.entity_b: Base is made out of plastic. Large shoot for medium to small sized fruits.

cont.entity_a: Cleanup is fast with only four parts to clean. Easy to clean and makes orange juice fast and easy. Cleaning and maintaining the machine are very easy. Juiced 26 large oranges in ~30 minutes including cleanup.
cont.entity_b: Easier to clean than centrifugal juicers. Included brushes make cleanup easier. Not dishwasher safe and kind of hard to clean. Not easy to clean and can get clogged.

cont.entity_a: Well built, robust, and whizzes through any citrus fruit. Solid, fast, quiet, and reliable.
cont.entity_b: Top plastic piece breaks easily and can't handle whole carrots. Rust can form behind the blades.

cont.entity_a: Fast and powerful but results in much pulp. Quiet enough for home use if space allows.
cont.entity_b: Silent and extracts all the juice out of everything.

cont.entity_a: Powerful and silent motor while waiting for the next orange. Only one speed which can be intimidating for casual users.
cont.entity_b: Juicer works great but isn't as powerful as expected.

cont.entity_a: The strainer does not take enough pulp out.
cont.entity_b: The quality of juice is much better than centrifugal juicers. Uses much less produce and provides high yield. Very good for juicing greens with nice juice consistency. High quality fresh slow juice with great juice consistency.

cont.entity_a: High powered and very easy to use, perfect for a commercial environment.
cont.entity_b: Requires cutting fruit into pieces for juicing.

cont.entity_a: Great juicer but would be better if more affordable.

cont.entity_b: Parts can get stuck and are hard to open after juicing. Fibrous vegetables can wrap around the auger and jam.
